definition: heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of high frequency ultrasound in diagnosis of trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高频超声对跟腱损伤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the results of the treatment of old Achilles tendon rupture repaired by the fascia lata transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结采用阔筋膜移植治疗陈旧性跟腱断裂的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To conclude the method and experience of reconstruction of Achilles tendon rupture with peroneus longus tendon transfer.
sentences.chinese: 目的腓骨长肌腱转移修复跟腱断裂的手术和经验。

sentences.english: Conclution High frequency ultrasound may be the first choice to diagnose trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 结论高频超声可作为跟腱损伤的首选影像学检查方法。

sentences.english: I've had my bouts with achilles tendonitis, heel pain, and knee pain.
sentences.chinese: 我曾患有跟腱炎，脚跟疼和关节痛。

sentences.english: Los Angeles was without Kwame Brown, who sat out the game with bursitis in his right heel.
sentences.chinese: 湖人队的布朗由于右跟腱有伤缺席了今天的比赛。

sentences.english: Results High frequency ultrasound could confirm trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 结果高频超声能清晰显示跟腱的损伤程度。

sentences.english: Objective Did research on the biomechanics property's effect on the viscoelasticity of tendon.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大骨节病对跟腱力学性质的影响。

sentences.english: An achilles tendon injury has forced elliot to withdraw from the world championships.
sentences.chinese: 跟腱损伤迫使伊里亚德退出世界锦标赛。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the clinical therapeutic effectiveness of the treatment of tendinitis achillea by acupuncturing the kidney channel.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨从肾经论治跟腱炎的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Metheds 31cases with trauma of tendo calcaneus were examined with high frequency ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 方法应用高频超声检查31例跟腱损伤。

definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
